ComicInfo.Title: From Bad to Worse
ComicInfo.Summary: The Wickedest Witch's powers continue to grow, along with the strength of the Goblin horde army, leading to a showdown with the Witch and the Goblin King. Lion, Jinjur and Jack Pumpkinhead discover the devastation wrought by the Quadlings upon the Lion's animal forest domain. And the Wizard and Amber Ombi butt heads over the role of the new All-Ozzian Army in this post-Nome King Oz. Based on the Wonderful Wizard of Oz books.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev57 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-09 18:27:10. [Issue ID 43217]
ComicInfo.Characters: Cowardly Lion,Jinjur,Wicked Witch of the West,Scraps,Betsy Bobbin,Ozma,Hungry Tiger,Dorothy Gale,Wizard Of Oz,Jack Pumpkinhead,Scarecrow,Shaggy Man,Tin Woodman,Amber Ombi,Troi,Tik-Tok
